description: This file contains unit tests for the Kotlin project template in the universalinit project. It tests project initialization, parameter validation, post-processing execution, template variable replacement, and handling of missing configuration files.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the basic project initialization process, verifying directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_kotlin_template_validates_parameters
methods.description: Checks that the Kotlin template accepts any parameters without validation errors.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Verifies that the post-processing script runs successfully and completes.

methods.name: test_kotlin_template_basic_replacements
methods.description: Ensures that project info is correctly replaced in Kotlin source files.

methods.name: test_kotlin_init_info
methods.description: Validates that the initialization info extracted from the Kotlin template contains correct commands and environment info.

methods.name: test_kotlin_with_missing_template_config
methods.description: Tests handling of missing configuration files, expecting failure to initialize.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Checks loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Verifies that template variables in files are correctly replaced with project info.

methods.name: test_special_character_handling
methods.description: Ensures special characters in project info are handled properly in generated files.
